sentences.sContent: Four paintings stolen from the gallery have been recovered.
sentences.sCn: 美术馆的四幅被盗画作已经失而复得。

remMethod.val: re (重新) + cover (包括) → 版图里重新包括 → 收复， 重新得到

words.tran: 可收回的；可恢复的；可补偿的
回收器；财产收回取得者；追索财产者

trans.tranCn: 重新获得； 痊愈， 复原
trans.tranOther: to get back something that was taken from you, lost, or almost destroyed
